GSP27motik_3u:1: oṃ kṛtvā cittaṃ svabodhasmaraṇavinihataṃ {2} prauḍhamohāndhakāraṃ smṛtvā jñānapradāṃ tāṃ sumahitavibhavāṃ śrīguroḥ pādukāṃ ca /
GSP27motik_3u:2: dhyātvā vighnāntakaṃ taṃ śivasutam anaghaṃ śrīgaṇeśaṃ sureśam utpattyākhyāvagāhiprakaraṇavivṛtis tanyate bhāskareṇa //
GSP27motik_3u:3: evaṃ mumukṣuvyavahārākhye prakaraṇe vakṣyamāṇopadeśādhikāritvasampādananimittaṃ {3} vyavahāraṃ pratipādya tacchravaṇamātreṇa ca śrīrāmaṃ prāptatadanuṣṭhānaphalaṃ vibhāvya {4}
GSP27motik_3u:4: prapañcasyānutpattisatattvotpattijñānam upādeyabhūtamokṣaprāptau mūlakāraṇatayā niścitya tadupapādakam utpattiprakaraṇam {5} ārabhamāṇaḥ vakṣyamāṇabrahmaikatvāśrayaṇena guruśiṣyabhāvānupapattiṃ puraskṛtya svavyatiriktaśiṣyopadeśabhāvena {6} paraprayuktaṃ codyam abhiśaṅkamānaḥ
GSP27motik_3u:5: taduddhāranimittabhūtaṃ brahmaikatve 'pi svapnadṛṣṭāntena padārthabhedagrāhakaṃ brahmavidanubhavaṃ prathamaṃ {7} kathayati ||
GSP27motik_3u:14: vāgbhābhir brahmavid brahma bhāti svapna ivātmani /
GSP27motik_3u:15: yad-idaṃ-tat-sva-śabdārthair yo yad vetti sa vettu tat // Mo_3,1.1 //
GSP27motik_3u:20: kim iti karmāpekṣāyāṃ paśya mṛgo dhāvatītivat vākyaṃ karmatvena kathayati
GSP27motik_3u:22: "brahma" nānāpadārthabhāvena bṛṃhitaṃ {9} kim api sūkṣmaṃ vastu |
GSP27motik_3u:39: idaṃ bhānaṃ ca arthāt jāgratkālīnaṃ {11} jñeyam |
GSP27motik_3u:45: bhāsamānā ete padārthāḥ hi svapnapadārthavat vikalparūpā eva |
GSP27motik_3u:56: svapne hi ātmabhāvena {14} sthitasya brahmaṇaḥ padārthabhāvena bhānaṃ sarvasākṣikam eva
GSP27motik_3u:57: nanv anye bauddhādayaḥ sarvathā padārthāpahnavaṃ kurvanti |
GSP27motik_3u:58: tat kathaṃ tvayaivam uktam ity āha "yo yad" iti |
GSP27motik_3u:59: yaḥ yaḥ kaścit brahmavidaḥ bauddhādiḥ yat yat padārthānāṃ sarvathā asattvādi "vetti" anubhavati
GSP27motik_3u:65: tatrāpi "idaṃ"śabdaḥ pratyakṣavedyaniṣṭhaḥ iti sarvanāmacatuṣkenaiva sarvapadārthākṣepasiddhāv anupayuktatvād anyeṣām akathanam iti jñeyam |
GSP27motik_3u:66: atha vā "brahmavid" ity āmantraṇapadaṃ brahmajñānādhikṛte śrīrāme viśiṣṭādhikāritvasūcanāya prayuktaṃ |
GSP27motik_3u:77: proktabrahmavidanubhavāśrayaṇena śaṅkāviṣayīkṛtaṃ paraprayuktaṃ codyaṃ pariharati nyāyenānena sarvasmin sarge brahmāmbare sati /
GSP27motik_3u:78: kim idaṃ kasya vakṣīti codyacañcur nirākṛtaḥ // Mo_3,1.2 //
GSP27motik_3u:79: "anena nyāyena" anayā padārthānāṃ brahmamayatve 'pi bhedasādhikayā brahmavidanubhavarūpayā yuktyā |
GSP27motik_3u:101: brahmavidā paramārthena brahmaikatve 'pi vyavahāradaśāyāṃ svapnatulyasya śiṣyasya yādṛśo yakṣaḥ tādṛśo balir iti nyāyāśrayaṇena tadrūpopadeśakaraṇaṃ yuktam eva svapnatulyasya jagataḥ aṅgīkaraṇāt |
GSP27motik_3u:102: sarvathā padārthāpahnavakāriṇāṃ bauddhādīnām evedaṃ codyaṃ yuktam iti || MoT_3,1.2 ||
GSP27motik_3u:105: evaṃ śaṅkitacodyanirāsaṃ kṛtvā svopadeśaṃ prati śrotṝn saṃmukhīkaroti ahaṃ tāvad yathājñānaṃ yathāvastu yathākramam /
GSP27motik_3u:106: yathāsvabhāvaṃ vacmīdaṃ tat sarvaṃ śrūyatāṃ budhāḥ // Mo_3,1.3 //
GSP27motik_3u:123: "budhā" ity āmantraṇapadaṃ budhānām evaitacchāstraśravaṇe adhikāritvaṃ sūcayati |
GSP27motik_3u:124: "sarvam" ity anena sakalam idaṃ śrutvā paramaprayojanāvāptiḥ bhaviṣyatīty ardhād utthāya na gantavyam iti sūcitam || MoT_3,1.3 ||
GSP27motik_3u:128: evaṃ śravaṇayogyaṃ budhavargaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtyotpattiprakaraṇatātparyārthaṃ ślokena saṅgṛhya kathayati svapnavat paśyati jagac cinnabho dehavinmayam /
GSP27motik_3u:130: cetayati pāṣāṇaprakhyaṃ karaṇavargaṃ svāveśena cetanakriyākartṛtve prerayatīti "cit" sarvāntargataṃ kim api śuddhaṃ tattvaṃ |
GSP27motik_3u:131: atha vā cetatīti "cit" citikriyākartṛbhūtaṃ kim api tattvam |
GSP27motik_3u:145: nanu svapnaḥ kim iha dṛṣṭāntatvena datta ity |
GSP27motik_3u:156: | ataḥ svapnasya dṛṣṭāntatvam uktam iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_3,1.4 ||
GSP27motik_3u:157: saṅgraheṇoktam arthaṃ mūḍhabuddhiṣu praveśanāya svataḥ sarvajñaṃ śrīrāmaṃ madhyekṛtya vistārayituṃ prastauti mumukṣuvyavahāroktimayāt prakaraṇāt param /
GSP27motik_3u:167: pratijñātaprakaraṇārambhaṃ karoti bandho 'yaṃ dṛśyasadbhāvo dṛśyābhāve na bandhanam /
GSP27motik_3u:168: na sambhavati dṛśyaṃ tu yathedaṃ tac chṛṇu kramāt // Mo_3,1.6 //
GSP27motik_3u:180: nanu sato dṛśyasya katham abhāvaḥ setsyatīty |
GSP27motik_3u:192: nanu kimartham utpattiprakaraṇam eva prathamaṃ kathayasīty apekṣāyām āha utpadyate yo jagati sa eva kila vardhate /
GSP27motik_3u:193: sa eva mokṣam āpnoti svargaṃ vā narakaṃ ca vā // Mo_3,1.7 //
GSP27motik_3u:199: atrāha atas teṣv avabodhārthaṃ tat tāvat kathayāmy aham /
GSP27motik_3u:200: utpattiṃ saṃsṛtāv eti pūrvam eva hi yo yathā // Mo_3,1.8 //
GSP27motik_3u:217: ata evāsya prakaraṇasyotpattiprakaraṇam iti nāmāpi bhavatīti jñeyam || MoT_3,1.8 ||
GSP27motik_3u:221: tatra tāvat saṅkṣepakathanaṃ {20} pratijānīte idaṃ prakaraṇārthaṃ tvaṃ saṅkṣepāc chṛṇu rāghava
GSP27motik_3u:222: tataḥ prakathayiṣyāmi vistaraṃ te yathepsitam // Mo_3,1.9 //
GSP27motik_3u:231: saṅkṣepakathanena vinā tvatsandehānutthānāt vistareṇa kathanaṃ na sambhavati |
GSP27motik_3u:235: pratijñātāṃ saṅkṣepataḥ jagadutpattiṃ kathayiṣyan prapañcākrāntabuddheḥ śiṣyasya vidhimukhena mūlakāraṇasvarūpakathanam ayuktaṃ jñātvā sthūṇānikhanananyāyam āśritya jagannāśamukhena mūlakāraṇasvarūpaṃ kathayituṃ {21} prastauti yad idaṃ dṛśyate sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam tat suṣupta iva svapnaḥ kalpānte pravinaśyati // Mo_3,1.10 //
GSP27motik_3u:243: "tat kalpānte" āntarārthavivakṣāyāṃ sarvadṛśyakṣayarūpāyāṃ turyāvasthāyāṃ viśeṣataḥ tadatītāvasthāyāṃ ca |
GSP27motik_3u:252: nanu suṣuptau jagato bījabhāvenāvasthānāt anyathā punarbhavāyogāt katham ayam upamānopameyabhāvaḥ siddhyatīti cen |
GSP27motik_3u:254: staimityākhyasya sāmānyadharmasyobhayatrāpy avasthānāt sāmānyadharmamātrāśrayaṇenaiva {25} hi upamānopameyabhāvaḥ uttiṣṭhati |
GSP27motik_3u:262: yatsvarūpaprakaṭanārtham ayaṃ yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ tan mūlakāraṇaṃ śeṣatvena kathayati tataḥ stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam /
GSP27motik_3u:263: anākhyam anabhivyaktaṃ yat kiñcid avaśiṣyate // Mo_3,1.11 // {26}
GSP27motik_3u:265: "yat kiñcit" kenāpi nāmnā vaktum aśākyaṃ kim api sūkṣmaṃ vastu |
GSP27motik_3u:267: tasyāpi nāśe nāśopalabdhur abhāvena sampanno 'pi prapañcanāśaḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:269: nanu nāmataḥ tad vastu kathaṃ noktam ity |
GSP27motik_3u:276: bāhyāntaratvena sthitair {29} indriyair apratyakṣīkṛtam ity arthaḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:280: atrāpi viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa hetum āha "na tejo na tama" iti |
GSP27motik_3u:287: tathāpi śūnyatāpattim āśaṅkya viśeṣaṇam āha "tatam" iti |
GSP27motik_3u:289: śūnyatve kathaṃ tatatvaṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:294: nirālambanatvena svabhinnasyāvagāḍhuḥ abhāvāt duravagāhaṃ cety arthaḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:295: ataś ca nirālambaśuddhacinmātrarūpatayā protam astīti bhāvaḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:297: "param" iti vakṣyamāṇanītyā {31} tasya tattvasya prapañcodbhāvanaṃ prati sarvadaiva spando vartata eveti |
GSP27motik_3u:298: śuddhatayā sthitasya tasyopalabdhiḥ kadāpi na sambhavaty eva |
GSP27motik_3u:300: deśāntaraṃ dūram" ityādivakṣyamāṇanītyā {32} madhyavṛttiṣu sadā tadupalabdhiḥ sambhavaty eveti na vimukhena bhavitavyam |
GSP27motik_3u:301: videhamuktānāṃ tu sarvadā tanmayatvam api sambhavati |
GSP27motik_3u:302: yataḥ asya cinmātratattvasyedṛśa eva mahimā bhavati |
GSP27motik_3u:303: yat sarvadā viśvamayaṃ tad uttīrṇaṃ ca bhavatīti na kiñcid viruddham || MoT_3,1.11 ||
GSP27motik_3u:309: nanu yadi tat tattvam anākhyam asti tat kathaṃ budhaiḥ tasya tattvasya "ṛtaṃ ātme"tyādikāḥ sañjñāḥ kṛtāḥ ity |
GSP27motik_3u:310: atrāha ṛtam ātmā paraṃ brahma satyam ityādikā budhaiḥ /
GSP27motik_3u:311: kalpitā vyavahārārthaṃ yasya sañjñā mahātmanaḥ // Mo_3,1.12 //
GSP27motik_3u:315: na tu kiñcit pravṛttinimittam upādāya "ṛtā"dikāḥ "sañjñāḥ" tatra pravartante iti bhāvaḥ
GSP27motik_3u:318: atrāha sa tathābhūta evātmā svayam anya ivollasan /
GSP27motik_3u:320: "tathābhūta eva" paramārthataḥ proktāt svarūpād apracyuta eva |
GSP27motik_3u:322: proktaviśeṣaṇayuktam sarvadā bhātatvena sātatyagamanakriyākartṛbhūtaṃ cinmātrākhyaṃ tattvam
GSP27motik_3u:330: svaparāmarśanamātreṇaiva hi cinmātrasya cetyarūpo jīvādibhāvaḥ bhavati |
GSP27motik_3u:332: na hi tathābhūtasya paramārthataḥ atathābhāvo yuktaḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:333: na hi sadā jalabhāvāt apracyutasya jalasya taraṅgatāsādane 'pi paramārthataḥ ajalabhāvo yuktaḥ
GSP27motik_3u:341: bhāvitvaṃ ca nāmnaḥ vaikharīprādurbhāve jñeyam || MoT_3,1.13 ||
GSP27motik_3u:344: adhunā tasyaiva jīvatvānantarabhāvinīṃ manastāṃ kathayati tataḥ sa jīvaśabdārthakalanākulatāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27motik_3u:345: mano bhavati maunātma mananān mantharībhavan {34} // Mo_3,1.14 //
GSP27motik_3u:372: sarvathā cetyavyatiriktasvarūpaṃ cinmātraṃ prathamaṃ cittvenāham iti svaparā-marśaṃ
GSP27motik_3u:374: tatra grāhakatayā sthitasya bhāgasya cid iti nāma |
GSP27motik_3u:376: tataḥ tasya jīvasya svasmin aṇutvaparāmarśo bhavati |
GSP27motik_3u:377: tad eva ca tasya manastvam iti || MoT_3,1.14 ||
GSP27motik_3u:382: phalitaṃ kathayati manaḥ sampadyate tena mahataḥ paramātmanaḥ /
GSP27motik_3u:383: susthirād asthirākāras taraṅga iva vāridheḥ // Mo_3,1.15 //
GSP27motik_3u:394: atra ca susthiratvaṃ taraṅgāpekṣayā jñeyam || MoT_3,1.15 ||
GSP27motik_3u:397: manasaḥ {38} utpattim uktvā tatkāryabhūtasya jagataḥ utpattiṃ kathayati
GSP27motik_3u:398: tat svayaṃ svairam evāśu saṅkalpayati nityaśaḥ /
GSP27motik_3u:417: paramātmotthān manasaḥ sṛṣṭyutthānakathanaphalam āha yathā kaṭakaśabdārthaḥ pṛthaktvārho 'sti kānake /
GSP27motik_3u:418: na nāma kaṭake tadvaj jagacchabdārthatā pare // Mo_3,1.17 //
GSP27motik_3u:430: | arthāt proktanītyā jagattayā sthite uttīrṇe cinmātre |
GSP27motik_3u:431: sthitasya jagacchabdasyārthaḥ parāt "pṛthaktvārhaḥ na" bhavati || MoT_3,1.17 ||
GSP27motik_3u:434: mūḍhabuddhiṣu saṅkramaṇārthaṃ punar apy etad eva kathayati brahmaṇy evāsty ananyātma yathāsthitam idaṃ jagat /
GSP27motik_3u:437: na tv anyaṃ prakāram āsādyeti yāvat |
GSP27motik_3u:456: asattvasādhikām ata evoktārthadārḍhyakāriṇīṃ manasaḥ sakāśāt jagadutpattim anuvadati asataivāsatī tāpanadyeva laharī calā /
GSP27motik_3u:466: na hi brahmavyatirekeṇa manasaḥ pṛthak sattā asti |
GSP27motik_3u:475: nanu kathaṃ pūrvaśloke kanakakaṭakasya dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ iha tāpanadīlaharyāḥ iti cet |
GSP27motik_3u:477: pūrvaśloke jagataḥ paramārthataḥ brahmarūpatvakathanārthaṃ kanakakaṭakasya dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ |
GSP27motik_3u:478: asmin śloke tu tasyaivānupapattinivāraṇāya brahmavyatirekeṇāsattvakathanārthaṃ tāpanadīlaharyāḥ dṛṣṭāntatvam ity ekaphalasādhakatvān na dṛṣṭāntadvayasya vaiṣamyam |
GSP27motik_3u:480: tathā ca bhinnasattābhājaḥ tasya brahmatvakathanam ayuktaṃ syāt |
GSP27motik_3u:484: iti tadantargatasya dṛṣṭāntasyāpi tadartham eva saḥ yuktaḥ || MoT_3,1.19
GSP27motik_3u:487: jāgatīm indrajālaśriyaṃ viśinaṣṭi avidyā saṃsṛtir bandho māyā moho mahat tamaḥ /
GSP27motik_3u:490: adhunā proktāyāḥ indrajālaśriyāḥ sakāśāt mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaṃ śiṣyaṃ jñātvā mokṣasvarūpanirūpaṇaṃ vinā śiṣyasya mokṣāvāptim ajānan mokṣasvarūpanirūpaṇam api tadviruddhabandhasvarūpajñānaṃ vināśakyaṃ manyamānaḥ tatsvarūpanirūpaṇaṃ pratijānīte |
GSP27motik_3u:492: bandhasya tāvad rūpaṃ tvaṃ kathyamānam idaṃ śṛṇu |
GSP27motik_3u:498: heyanirūpaṇānantaram upādeyanirūpaṇasya yuktatvād iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_3,1.21 ||
GSP27motik_3u:501: bandhasvarūpaṃ kathayati draṣṭur dṛśyatvasattāṅga bandha ity abhidhīyate /
GSP27motik_3u:502: draṣṭā dṛśyavaśād baddho dṛśyābhāvād vimucyate // Mo_3,1.22 //
GSP27motik_3u:515: tadabhāve tasyāpy abhāvāt iti hetudvayaṃ vākyadvaye svayaṃ yojyam || MoT_3,1.22 ||
GSP27motik_3u:516: tatra dṛśyasvarūpaṃ kathayati jagat tvam aham ityādi sargātmā {43} dṛśyam ucyate /
GSP27motik_3u:517: yāvad etat sambhavati tāvan mokṣo na vidyate // Mo_3,1.23 //
GSP27motik_3u:525: kuta ity ākāṅkṣāyām viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa hetuṃ kathayati |
GSP27motik_3u:528: sṛjyamānasya ca dṛśyatvaṃ sphuṭam eva darśanapūrvakatvāt |
GSP27motik_3u:541: nedam iti vacanakathanamātreṇaiva śāntadṛśyatvābhimānayuktaṃ śiṣyaṃ prati āha nedaṃ nedam iti vyarthaiḥ pralāpair nopaśāmyati /
GSP27motik_3u:558: draṣṭṛviṣayatvāt {46} niṣedho 'pi hi draṣṭuḥ svataḥ bhinnatayā bhāti || MoT_3,1.24 ||
GSP27motik_3u:561: nanu "nedam" iti vacanamātreṇa {47} dṛśyaśāntiḥ mā bhavatu |
GSP27motik_3u:563: atrāha na ca tarkabharakṣodair na tīrthaniyamādibhiḥ /
GSP27motik_3u:564: sato dṛśyasya jagato yasmād ete vicārakāḥ // Mo_3,1.25 //
GSP27motik_3u:580: nanu tarkāḥ sad api jagat paryante bhāgataḥ anityatvena kathayantīti teṣām api bhāgataḥ dṛśyaśāntyupapādakatvam asty evety |
GSP27motik_3u:581: atrāha jagad dṛśyaṃ tu yady asti na śāmyaty eva tat kvacit /
GSP27motik_3u:582: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ {50} // Mo_3,1.26 //
GSP27motik_3u:601: dṛśyaparamārthasattve doṣam āha acetyacitsvarūpātmā {52} yatra yatraiṣa tiṣṭhati /
GSP27motik_3u:602: draṣṭā tatrāsya dṛśyaśrīḥ samudety apy aṇūdare // Mo_3,1.27 //
GSP27motik_3u:621: nanu tādṛśe sūkṣmatare deśe 'rme katham etādṛśasya prapañcasyāvasthānaṃ sambhavati |
GSP27motik_3u:623: sthūladṛśyasaṃskārotpāditayā smṛtyā tatra tasya prādurbhāvaḥ sidhyaty eva [---]tvāt || MoT_3,1.27
GSP27motik_3u:628: draṣṭur asti jagad dṛśyaṃ tat pramṛṣṭam {55} idaṃ mayā /
GSP27motik_3u:638: yathā tṛptyarthaṃ bhakṣitena kāñcikadravyeṇa pratyuta kṣut eva jāyate |
GSP27motik_3u:639: tathā svabhinnadevatārādhanārtham anuṣṭhitaiḥ tapaḥprabhṛtibhiḥ api dṛśyavṛddhir eva jāyate iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_3,1.28 ||
GSP27motik_3u:646: mokṣāvasthāyāṃ dṛśyān nirgatasyāta {57} eva viśeṣaguṇāsaṃvedanapātratāṃ gatasyātisūkṣmasya jīvasyedaṃ dṛśyaṃ kiṃ
GSP27motik_3u:648: na hi suptasya bāhyajagatkṛtaṃ vyākulatvaṃ dṛśyate ity |
GSP27motik_3u:649: atrāha yadi nāma jagad dṛśyam asti tat pratibimbati /
GSP27motik_3u:650: paramāṇūdare 'py asmiṃś cidādarśe na saṃśayaḥ // Mo_3,1.29 //
GSP27motik_3u:662: atrāha yatra tatra sthitaṃ rāma yathādarśe prabimbati /

GSP27motik_3u:3121: 1 kathito (naiṣa dūre 'vatiṣṭhate śarīre saṃsthito nityaṃ cinmātram iti viśrutaḥ) *yasmin
GSP27motik_3u:3122: śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaraṃ kathayati ya eṣa devaḥ kathito naiṣa dūre 'vatiṣṭhate /
GSP27motik_3u:3123: śarīre saṃsthito nityaṃ cinmātram iti viśrutaḥ // Mo_3,7.2 //
GSP27motik_3u:3130: anyathā pāṣāṇatulyasya śarīrasyāpi mṛtaśarīravat ceṣṭāśrayatvaṃ na syāt |
GSP27motik_3u:3131: na ca śarīrasthasya dūrasthatvaṃ vaktuṃ yuktaṃ |
GSP27motik_3u:3132: svahastayor api dūrasthatvāsaṃyogāt {2} iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_3,7.2 ||
GSP27motik_3u:3136: tathā ca dehavad anityatvam apy asya syād ity |
GSP27motik_3u:3137: atrāha eṣa sarvam idaṃ viśvaṃ na viśvaṃ tv eṣa sarvagaḥ /
GSP27motik_3u:3138: vidyate hy eṣa evaiko na tu viśvābhidhāsti dṛk // Mo_3,7.3 //
GSP27motik_3u:3153: | na hi taraṅgākrānte jale taraṅgābhidhā dṛk bhavati |
GSP27motik_3u:3154: bhāsamāneṣv api taraṅgeṣu vivekijanadṛṣṭyā jalatvānapāyāt || MoT_3,7.3 ||
GSP27motik_3u:3160: tat {6} katham tvayā "vidyate hy" "eṣa evaika" ity uktam ity |
GSP27motik_3u:3161: atrāha cinmātram eṣa śaśibhṛc cinmātraṃ garuḍadhvajaḥ {7} /
GSP27motik_3u:3162: cinmātram eva tapanaś cinmātraṃ kamalodbhavaḥ // Mo_3,7.4 //
GSP27motik_3u:3171: sacetanatve tu sphuṭam cinmātram eva tadbhāvena sphurati |
GSP27motik_3u:3172: nanu tarhi śaśibhṛtkīṭayoḥ samatvam eva syād iti cet |
GSP27motik_3u:3176: na hi agnikaṇamahāgnicayayoḥ kāryavailakṣaṇyena {9} bhedaḥ kalpayituṃ yuktaḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:3177: nanu agnikaṇamahāgnicayayoḥ kāryavailakṣaṇyaṃ nāsti dāhākhyasyaikasya kāryasya darśanāt iti cet |
GSP27motik_3u:3179: kiṃrūpaṃ kāryavailakṣaṇyam asti jñānakriyāyāḥ karaṇakriyāyāś caikatvāt |
GSP27motik_3u:3181: saḥ dṛṣṭānte 'py astīti na ko 'pi virodhaḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:3197: śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati bālā api vadanty etad yadi cetanamātrakam /
GSP27motik_3u:3198: jagad ity eva kevātra nāma syād upadeśatā // Mo_3,7.5 //
GSP27motik_3u:3206: atra "bālā" ity anena vijñānavādināṃ bauddhānāṃ grahaṇam |
GSP27motik_3u:3207: te eva hi vijñānāparaparyāyasya cetanasyātmatvaṃ kathayanti || MoT_3,7.5 ||
GSP27motik_3u:3208: śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaraṃ kathayati cinmātraṃ cetanaṃ viśvam iti yaj jñātavān asi /
GSP27motik_3u:3209: na kiñcid etad vijñātaṃ bhavatā bhavatāraṇam // Mo_3,7.6 //
GSP27motik_3u:3219: cinmātrapadārthajñānamātreṇaiva hi ca saṃsāraḥ naśyati || MoT_3,7.6 ||
GSP27motik_3u:3221: atrāha cetanaṃ nāma saṃsāro jīva eṣa paśuḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSP27motik_3u:3225: cinmātrasthasya cetyaunmukhyasyaiva cetanatvāt cetyaunmukhyasyaiva ca saṃsāratvāt |
GSP27motik_3u:3228: cinmātrasya ca cetyaunmukhyasamaye śuddhacinmātratārūpāt svasthānāt utthānaṃ bhavaty evānyathā cetyaunmukhyatvaṃ nāma kiṃ syāt |
GSP27motik_3u:3235: ataḥ tadvati tadupacārāt cetanasyaiva jīvatvam bhavati |
GSP27motik_3u:3236: tadvati tadupacārāśrayaṇaṃ tv atra paramārthataḥ śuddhacinmātrarūpasya jīvasya jīvatve jīvanakriyāvyatiriktasādhanāntarabuddhinirāsārthaṃ kṛtam |
GSP27motik_3u:3244: svapnadraṣṭari {10} na svapnaśarīragatāḥ jarāmaraṇavīcaya iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_3,7.7 ||
GSP27motik_3u:3247: punar apy etad eva kathayati paśur ajño hy amūrto 'pi duḥkhasyaivaiṣa bhājanam /
GSP27motik_3u:3248: cetanatvāc cetatīdam atyanarthaḥ svayaṃ sthitaḥ // Mo_3,7.8 //
GSP27motik_3u:3263: cetanasya hy etad eva cetanatvaṃ yat kiñcic "cetatī"ti "cetanatvād" ity uktam |
GSP27motik_3u:3269: atra ca svapnasya dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ sphuṭam eveti nāyastam || MoT_3,7.8 ||
GSP27motik_3u:3272: nanv asya cetanasyedaṃ duḥkhaṃ kiṃ kadācic chrāmyed apīty |
GSP27motik_3u:3273: atrāha cetyanirmuktatā yā syād acetyonmukhatātha vā /
GSP27motik_3u:3274: asya sā bharitāvasthā tāṃ jñātvā nānuśocati // Mo_3,7.9 //
GSP27motik_3u:3275: "cetyāt nirmuktatā" prathamaṃ svātantryeṇa cetyābhimukhībhūya tataḥ vicāradvāreṇa tataḥ niṣkrāntiḥ
GSP27motik_3u:3288: bharitāvasthānena svasmin sthitāyāḥ cetanatāyāḥ asatyatvajñānena tadukte
GSP27motik_3u:3294: nanu tadā asya cetanasya kīdṛśī avasthā bhaviṣyatīty |
GSP27motik_3u:3296: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāpare {14} // Mo_3,7.10 //
GSP27motik_3u:3318: nanu tarhi atyantopādeyabhūtaṃ acetyonmukhatvam evāhaṃ sādhayāmīty |
GSP27motik_3u:3319: atrāha tasya cetyonmukhatvaṃ tu cetyāsambhavanaṃ vinā /
GSP27motik_3u:3320: roddhuṃ na śakyaṃ dṛśyaṃ tu cetyaṃ śāmyatu vai katham // Mo_3,7.11 //
GSP27motik_3u:3324: na hi tūlapiṇḍe patitaḥ agniḥ śānto bhavati |
GSP27motik_3u:3325: nanu tarhi cetyam eva nāśayāmi ity |
GSP27motik_3u:3332: cetyaṃ yadi asti tarhi kathaṃ śāmyet |
GSP27motik_3u:3333: yadi nāsti tadā cetyānaunmukhyaṃ svayam eva siddhaṃ bhavatīti |
GSP27motik_3u:3334: na tadāharaṇe jñānamātraṃ vinā prayatno yuktaḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:3335: na hi vandhyāputranāśacintā kenāpi kriyate iti || MoT_3,7.11 ||
GSP27motik_3u:3339: dṛśyate paramātmā yaḥ sa brahman vada kīdṛśaḥ // Mo_3,7.12 //
GSP27motik_3u:3349: śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ {18} śrīrāmapraśnam anādṛtya pūrvoktam evārthaṃ kathayati yad etac cetanaṃ jīvo viśīrṇo janmajaṅgale /
GSP27motik_3u:3350: etam ātmānam icchanti ye te 'jñāḥ paṇḍitā api // Mo_3,7.13 //
GSP27motik_3u:3351: "yad etat cetanam janmajaṅgale viśīrṇaḥ" paricchinnatāṃ gataḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:3354: "etam ye ātmānam icchanti te paṇḍitāḥ api" dehātmābhimānibhyaḥ sakāśāt kiñcinmātram vicāriṇaḥ api |
GSP27motik_3u:3361: atrāha jīva eveha saṃsārāś cetanād duḥkhasantateḥ /
GSP27motik_3u:3362: asmiñ jñāte na {19} vijñātaṃ kiñcid bhavati kutracit // Mo_3,7.14 //
GSP27motik_3u:3378: tarhi kasya jñānena kiñcit prāptaṃ bhavatīty |
GSP27motik_3u:3379: atrāha jñāyate paramātmā ced rāma tad duḥkhasantatiḥ /
GSP27motik_3u:3380: kṣayam eti viṣāveśaśāntāv iva viṣūcikā // Mo_3,7.15 //
GSP27motik_3u:3396: śrīrāmaḥ paramātmasvarūpaśravaṇākāṅkṣānirbharatvena kathanāyogyatvāc chrīvasiṣṭhenānādṛtam api ātmasvarūpapraśnaṃ punaḥ karoti rūpaṃ kathaya me brahman yathāvat paramātmanaḥ /
GSP27motik_3u:3397: yasmin dṛṣṭe naro mohāt samagrāt {21} santariṣyati // Mo_3,7.16 //
GSP27motik_3u:3402: śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ ākāṅkṣānirbharatvena śrīrāmasyādhikāritvaṃ niścityottaraṃ kathayati deśād deśāntaraṃ dūraṃ prāptāyāḥ saṃvido vapuḥ /
GSP27motik_3u:3403: nimeṣeṇaiva yan madhye tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ // Mo_3,7.17 //
GSP27motik_3u:3414: {23} "yat vapuḥ" bhavati yat anirvācyaṃ svarūpaṃ bhavati |
GSP27motik_3u:3421: nanu pūrvasaṃvedyam ālambanīkṛtya {24} tadaivottarasaṃvedyam ālambanīkurvantyāḥ saṃvidaḥ kim idaṃ madhyaṃ nāma yatrasthāyāḥ citaḥ paramātmarūpatā uktā |
GSP27motik_3u:3423: pūrvasaṃvedyena rañjitāyāḥ saṃvidaḥ svaṃ nirmalaṃ rūpam aprāpyottarasaṃvedyena kariṣyamāṇasya rāgasyāyuktatvāt nirmalasvarūpatāmayaṃ madhyam avaśyam evāstīti jñātavyam |
GSP27motik_3u:3424: yathā nīlīrāgarañjitasya paṭasya pītarāgakaraṇecchayā {25} prakṣālaṇena sphuṭīkṛtaṃ śuddhapaṭatāmayaṃ madhyaṃ bhavati |
GSP27motik_3u:3426: nanu pūrvasaṃvedyaviṣayā saṃvit pūrvam eva kṣīṇā |
GSP27motik_3u:3428: tathā ca madhyaṃ nāma śūnyam evāstīti |

GSP27motik_3u:3434: atra cābhyāsaṃ kurvatām acirād ayatnenaiva paramātmalābho bhaviṣyaty |
GSP27motik_3u:3435: asyaiva ca madhyadhāmāveśa iti nāmāstīty alaṃ rahasyodghāṭanena |
GSP27motik_3u:3436: atra ca sadṛśayoḥ saṃvedyayoḥ madhyam atidurlabham iti "dūram" ity uktam || MoT_3,7.17 ||
GSP27motik_3u:3446: yasmin bodhamahāmbhodhau tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ // Mo_3,7.18 //
GSP27motik_3u:3455: mumukṣuḥ sacchāstrādibhiḥ prathamaṃ rajjusarpādidṛṣṭāntena tataḥ kanakakaṭakādidṛṣṭāntena dṛśyasya brahmavyatiriktasattābhāvaṃ {29}
GSP27motik_3u:3456: niścitya śuddhacittattvaikye jātaniścayaḥ yadā abhyāsabalena sarvatra śuddhacittattvamātram evānubhavati suvarṇakāra iva kaṭakādiṣu suvarṇatām tadā tasya jñānam yatsvarūpaṃ bhavati tad eva paramātmasvarūpam {30} iti
GSP27motik_3u:3458: pūrvaṃ bhūtatvāt jagataḥ jagadatyantābhāve niścitasyāpi hi pūrvaṃ jagad bhāsamānam āsīd eveti ced |
GSP27motik_3u:3460: paurvakālikaṃ mithyābhānaṃ hi vastunaḥ uttarakāle niścitaṃ traikālikābhāvapratiyogitvaṃ {31} na nihanti |
GSP27motik_3u:3462: pūrvaṃ sarpatvena bhātāyāṃ {32} rajjau tu sarve sarpasya traikālikātyantābhāvapratiyogitvaṃ sphuṭam eva paśyantīti na ko 'pi
GSP27motik_3u:3469: draṣṭṛdṛśyakramo yatra sthito 'py astam alaṃ gataḥ /
GSP27motik_3u:3470: yad anākāśam ākāśas tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ // Mo_3,7.19 //
GSP27motik_3u:3472: "draṣṭṛdṛśyakramaḥ" ayaṃ draṣṭā idaṃ dṛśyam ity evaṃrūpaḥ kramaḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:3479: nanu sthitasya draṣṭṛdṛśyakramasya katham anyasmin layasambhavaḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:3480: tathā cānena dvāreṇa paramātmasvarūpakathanam ayuktam eveti cen |
GSP27motik_3u:3483: {34} tāvat kasyacit sākṣiṇaḥ bhātau bhavataḥ na vā |
GSP27motik_3u:3484: na cet kathaṃ tarhi tayoḥ draṣṭṛdṛśyatve sidhyataḥ {35 } |
GSP27motik_3u:3485: yathā tathā tatsiddhau api kathaṃ tayoḥ vyavasthā sidhyati {36} |
GSP27motik_3u:3486: ayaṃ draṣṭaivedaṃ {37} dṛśyam eveti bhātau {38} cet tarhi tasmin layaḥ tayoḥ sukaraḥ eva |
GSP27motik_3u:3487: na hi svapnasākṣiṇam atikramya svapnabhāte draṣṭṛdṛśye kenāpi svarūpeṇa yukte sambhavataḥ iti na kaścid virodhaḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:3504: aśūnyam iva yac chūnyaṃ yasmiñ śūnye jagat sthitam /
GSP27motik_3u:3505: sargaughe sati yac chūnyaṃ tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ // Mo_3,7.20 //
GSP27motik_3u:3511: na hi asad vastu kasyacid adhiṣṭhānībhavitum arhati |
GSP27motik_3u:3517: anyathā jagataḥ kiṃrūpatvaṃ syāt iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:3520: "sati" adhiṣṭheyatayā kāryatayā vā sthitiṃ bhajati sati |
GSP27motik_3u:3523: | na hi rajjau sarpāvasthānena mṛdi vā ghaṭāvasthānena svavyatiriktavastuyuktatvaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyate |
GSP27motik_3u:3527: 40 eva <tayā vā sthitiṃ bhajati sati yat śūnyam svavyatiriktavasturahitam
GSP27motik_3u:3530: jaḍaṃ tv ajaḍam evāntas tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ // Mo_3,7.21 //
GSP27motik_3u:3540: idaṃ viśeṣaṇadvayam yathāsaṅkhyātikrameṇa {41} pūrvārdhoktasyārthasya samarthakatvena jñeyam
GSP27motik_3u:3545: svarūpasattām āpnoti tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ // Mo_3,7.22 //
GSP27motik_3u:3558: tathedaṃ saṃsthitaṃ yatra tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ // Mo_3,7.23 //
GSP27motik_3u:3570: yathā bhāsamānaḥ ālokaḥ svapradhānatvena na kathyate |
GSP27motik_3u:3573: tathā bhāsamānam idaṃ jagat api anirvācye kasmin citsārabhūte pradhāne sthitam iti jñeyam
GSP27motik_3u:3574: yasmin tu sthitam asti tad eva paramātmā bhavatīti |
GSP27motik_3u:3575: nanv etaiḥ anumānagamyasya kasyāpi vastunaḥ paramātmatvaṃ sādhitam |
GSP27motik_3u:3576: tathā cāsau paramātmā kalpita iti jñeyam |
GSP27motik_3u:3580: upadeśyasya pratikṣaṇaṃ madhyāvasthāsu ātmatvena pratyakṣaṃ sphuraṇaśīlam apy ātmatayā ajñātam paramātmasvarūpaṃ |
GSP27motik_3u:3582: tavātmā bhavatīti na ko 'py atra pratibhāvataḥ prati anumānasparśaḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:3583: apratibhāvatāṃ tv atrādhikāra eva nāstīty alaṃ paradoṣaguṇavicāraṇena || MoT_3,7.23 ||
GSP27motik_3u:3586: śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati sarvataḥ paramātmaiṣa kathaṃ nāmābhibudhyate /
GSP27motik_3u:3602: ayaṃ ca praśnaḥ sarvadā paramātmamayatvāsādanākāṅkṣiṇā śrīrāmeṇa jāgrati pratikṣaṇaṃ sphuramāṇāḥ śuddhaparamātmasvarūpamayyaḥ {44} madhyāvasthāḥ anāśritya kṛtaḥ || MoT_3,7.24 ||
GSP27motik_3u:3606: śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaraṃ kathayati bhramasya jāgatasyāsya jātasyākāśavarṇavat /
GSP27motik_3u:3608: taj jñātaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ bhaven nānyena karmaṇā /
GSP27motik_3u:3609: dṛśyātyantābhāvatas tu ṛte nānyā śubhā gatiḥ // Mo_3,7.26 //
GSP27motik_3u:3633: prayatnasādhitasya abhāvasya pradhvaṃsābhāvatvād iti śuktau rajatātyantābhāvavat mṛdi ghaṭātyantābhāvavad {47} vātyantābhāvasambodhasyopāyatvakathanam
GSP27motik_3u:3637: nanu samyagjñānadvāreṇa siddhasya dṛśyatvarūpajagadatyantābhāvasyaiva kathaṃ paramātmaprāptau upāyatvam astīty |
GSP27motik_3u:3639: śiṣyate paramārtho 'sau budhyate jñāyate tataḥ // Mo_3,7.27 //
GSP27motik_3u:3645: śuktau bhātarajatātyantābhāvavat mṛdi bhātaghaṭātyantābhāvavad vā siddhau satyāṃ |
GSP27motik_3u:3646: "asau paramārthaḥ" dṛśyādhiṣṭhānabhūtaḥ dṛśyasārabhūtaḥ vā asau paramātmā {48} |
GSP27motik_3u:3648: rajatātyantābhāvajñāne iva śuktiḥ ghaṭātyantābhāvajñāne iva vā mṛt |
GSP27motik_3u:3649: tadvyatirekeṇānyasya kasyāpy asattvāt tataḥ puruṣeṇ"āsau budhyate" |
GSP27motik_3u:3656: nanu jñānopāyikaḥ dṛśyātyantābhāvo mā sidhyatu prāṇarodhanādyupāyajālasādhitayā {49} vismṛtyā eva paramātmajñānaṃ
GSP27motik_3u:3658: atrāha na cid apratibimbāsti dṛśyābhāvād ṛte kvacit /
GSP27motik_3u:3670: na hi bimbasattāyāṃ pratibimbarahitaḥ "ādarśaḥ" dṛśyate iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:3671: nanv anyadeśasthe bimbe sattāṃ bhajaty api ādarśaḥ pratibimbarahitaḥ dṛśyate |
GSP27motik_3u:3673: prāṇarodhādidvāreṇa bahiḥ aprasarantī cit dṛśyasparśarahitā bhaviṣyatīti cet |
GSP27motik_3u:3677: nanu tasya prāṇarodhādyupāyarāhityāt svapnapratibhānam astīti cet |
GSP27motik_3u:3678: tarhi dṛśyātyantābhāvajñānahīnān kapaṭarahitān prāṇarodhādikāriṇaḥ eva pṛccha |
GSP27motik_3u:3679: kiṃ yuṣmākaṃ svapnapratibhānam asti na veti |
GSP27motik_3u:3680: nanu kapaṭarahitāḥ dṛśyātyantābhāvajñānayuktā api asmābhiḥ pṛṣṭā eva |
GSP27motik_3u:3683: yathā jāgrati bhāsata eva jagataḥ atyantābhāvajñānaṃ teṣām {50} asti tathā svapne 'pi |
GSP27motik_3u:3684: na hi te bhāsamānam eva dṛśyaṃ dṛśyatayā paśyanti |
GSP27motik_3u:3685: kiṃ tu brahmatayety alaṃ prapañcena || MoT_3,7.28 ||
GSP27motik_3u:3689: nanu tathāpi dṛśyātyantābhāvena vinaivātmatattvaṃ paśyāma ity |
GSP27motik_3u:3691: budhyate paramaṃ tattvaṃ na kadācana kenacit // Mo_3,7.29 //
GSP27motik_3u:3702: tasmāt dṛśyātyantābhāvaḥ samyagjñānopāyena sādhyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_3,7.29 ||

GSP27motik_3u:4430: nanu kathaṃ videhamuktaḥ sūryādicarācarapadārthabhāvam āgatya tadgatāḥ sarvāḥ kriyāḥ

GSP27motik_3u:9519: kathaṃ svairaṃ ciraṃ kāntā rameyābdaśatāny aham // Mo_3,16.21 //
GSP27motik_3u:9520: "ahaṃ kāntānena bhartrā sahābdaśatāni kathaṃ rameya" kenopāyena varṣaśatāni krīḍāṃ kuryām ity arthaḥ || MoT_3,16.21 ||
GSP27motik_3u:9522: rajanīśarucī rājā yathā syād ajarāmaraḥ // Mo_3,16.22 //
GSP27motik_3u:9531: pṛcchāmi tāvan maraṇaṃ kathaṃ na syān nṛṇām iti // Mo_3,16.23 //
GSP27motik_3u:9532: "ahaṃ jñānavṛddhān tapovṛddhān" tathā "vidyāvṛddhān dvijān iti tāvat
GSP27motik_3u:9535: "nṛṇāṃ maraṇaṃ kathaṃ na syāt" kena hetunā na
GSP27motik_3u:9537: tasyāḥ saṅkalpam uktvā bāhyaprayatnam āha athānāyyāśu sampūjya dvijān papraccha sānatā /
GSP27motik_3u:9538: amaratvaṃ kathaṃ viprā bhaved iti punaḥ punaḥ // Mo_3,16.24 //
GSP27motik_3u:9544: viprā uttaraṃ kathayanti tapojapayamair devi samastāḥ siddhasiddhayaḥ /
GSP27motik_3u:9545: samprāpyante 'maratvaṃ tu na kadācana labhyate // Mo_3,16.25 //
GSP27motik_3u:9551: dvijebhyaḥ svepsitāsiddhiṃ śrutvā punar api taccintām āha ity ākarṇya dvijamukhāc {17} cintayām āsa sā punaḥ /
GSP27motik_3u:9558: atrāha maraṇaṃ bhartur agre me yadi daivād bhaviṣyati /
GSP27motik_3u:9559: tat sarvaduḥkhanirmuktā saṃsthāsye sukham ātmani // Mo_3,16.27 //
GSP27motik_3u:9562: tat kariṣye tathā yena jīvo gehān na yāsyati // Mo_3,16.28 //
GSP27motik_3u:9588: japopavāsaniyamair ā toṣaṃ pūjayāmy aham // Mo_3,16.30 //
GSP27motik_3u:9598: agre vakṣyamāṇaḥ jñaptyupadeśaś ca svapratibhākṛtaḥ jñeyaḥ |
GSP27motik_3u:9599: yataḥ yat yat līlayā kṛtaṃ śrutaṃ vā tat svapratibhayaiva |
GSP27motik_3u:9600: yad api gurvādimukhena śrūyate tad api svapratibhayaiva |
GSP27motik_3u:9602: cintānantaraṃ tatprayatnaṃ kathayati iti niścitya sā nātham anuktvaiva {21} varāṅganā /
GSP27motik_3u:9603: yathāśāstraṃ cacārograṃ tapo niyamam āsthitā // Mo_3,16.31 //
GSP27motik_3u:9608: tat tapaḥ viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa kathayati trirātrasya trirātrasya paryante {22} kṛtapāraṇā /
GSP27motik_3u:9636: atha jñaptiprasādam āha trirātrāṇāṃ śatenātha pūjitā {24} pratimām itā /
GSP27motik_3u:9637: tuṣṭā bhagavatī gaurī vāgīśīdam uvāca tām // Mo_3,16.36 //
GSP27motik_3u:9644: svayā pratibhayā pratimāyām ābhāsena tasyāḥ darśanaṃ dattavān {25} iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_3,16.36
GSP27motik_3u:9648: jñaptyā kathyamānaṃ vākyam āha nirantareṇa tapasā bhartṛbhaktyatiśāyinā /
GSP27motik_3u:9649: parituṣṭāsmi te vatse gṛhāṇa varam īpsitam // Mo_3,16.37 //
GSP27motik_3u:9651: jñaptivākyaṃ śrutvā rājñī tāṃ stauti jaya janmajarājvālādāhadoṣaśaśiprabhe /
GSP27motik_3u:9658: amba māṃ trijaganmātas trāyasva kṛpaṇām imām /
GSP27motik_3u:9659: idaṃ varadvayaṃ dehi yad iha prārthaye śubham // Mo_3,16.39 //
GSP27motik_3u:9662: varadvayamadhye ekaṃ kathayati ekaṃ tāvad videhasya bhartur jīvo mamāmbike /
GSP27motik_3u:9663: asmād eva hi mā yāsīn nijāntaḥpuramaṇḍapāt // Mo_3,16.40 //
GSP27motik_3u:9668: dvitīyaṃ kathayati dvitīyaṃ tvāṃ mahādevi prārthaye 'haṃ yadā yadā /
GSP27motik_3u:9669: darśanāya varārthena tadā me dehi darśanam // Mo_3,16.41 //
GSP27motik_3u:9673: "ahaṃ tvāṃ yadā darśanāya prārthaye tadā tvaṃ varārthena" varānurodhena |
